generated_body: In the article titled "3 Indiana judges suspended after a night of drinking turned into a White Castle brawl," the user may expect to read about the circumstances surrounding the suspension of three judges following an incident that escalated during a night out. Additionally, it may touch on public reactions to the incident and any statements made by the judges or the judicial system regarding their behavior.
